title: powell peralta skateboard label —what font?
content:
hey there.  
anybody an hint what font the powell peralta  
logo is made off?  
or which font is similar?  
thanx  
ali

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [powell peralta.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20090831151703/http:/typophile.com/files/powell%20peralta.png) | 5.88 KB |
author: alidigital

comments.content: Almost certainly custom or pre-digital. Have a look at [ITC Bauhaus](http://web.archive.org/web/20090831151703/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=bauhaus&sample_text=POWELL%20PERALTA&sample_size=36) and [Bryant](http://web.archive.org/web/20090831151703/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/process/bryant_2_pro/&sample_text=POWELL%20PERALTA&sample_size=36).

yeah its form the early eightes.  
just was hoping someone redid it.  
thanx for the links  
will check them now
Found a much closer match. David Buck must have used the photo typeface in question as inspiration for [Ruby](http://web.archive.org/).

man, that’s cool. thanx.  
this is really close.  
this will work!  
awesome
